alert.note: Alert for Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 1:34AM CST until March 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Blue River near Blue affecting Bryan County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Blue River near Blue. * WHEN...From early this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The river remains largely within its banks... throughout Bryan County. Inflows from local streams could cause minor overflows to reach very low fields for a short while. Only farmlands are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The Blue River is expected to rise to a crest of 26.8 feet this morning. - Action stage is 26.0 feet. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
